attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that an election should be called now, not because of any one issue, but because the public as a whole have lost faith in Gordon Brown and the Labour Party.  The country through recent polls has clearly had enough and wants a general election sooner rather than later.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
